item.title: Samsung Gives Employees Extra Time Off
item.description: Samsung Gives Employees Extra Time Off Samsung Electronics, the world’s largest memory chipmaker, is giving its workers some extra time off this year. The company will give its employees a three-day weekend on Chuseok, the Korean equivalent of Thanksgiving, which falls on September 9-11 this year.
